pageProduct.name: Swisse Collagen Joint + Muscle Health Powder 162g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Collagen Joint + Muscle Health Powder is a premium quality formula containing a combination of FORTIGEL® collagen and nutrients to support collagen formation, help reduce cartilage damage and relieve mild joint pain.

FORTIGEL® Collagen: A quality hydrolysed collagen. Hydrolysed collagen is broken into smaller polypeptides that pass through the gut intact.

Collagen Formation: Collagen is a key component of joint cartilage. Vitamin C supports collagen formation.

Reduces Cartilage Damage: Glucosamine helps reduce cartilage damage and maintains joint cartilage health.

Mild Joint Pain Relief: Glucosamine helps reduce mild joint pain and soreness.

Muscle Health: Magnesium supports muscle health and function.

Relieves Muscle Cramps & Spasms: Magnesium helps relieve muscle cramps and mild muscle spasms when dietary intake is inadequate.

Naturally Sweetened: Sweetened with naturally derived monk fruit and stevia.

Size: 162g

Warnings

WARNINGS:

The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 179.44 mg of sodium.

Ingredients

EACH DOSAGE (9 g) CONTAINS:

VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 50 mg
MAGNESIUM (from magnesium citrate nonahydrate) 105 mg
FORTIGEL® (hydrolysed collagen) 5 g
GLUCOSAMINE SULFATE (from glucosamine sulfate sodium chloride 1.89 g) 1.5 g
ALLERGEN INFORMATION

Contains sulfites
No added lactose, gluten, yeast, egg, soy, artificial flavours or colours.
Derived from seafood.

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

Mix 3 level metric teaspoons (9 g) with 200 mL of water. Consume once daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Once dissolved, consume immediately. Some settling of the powder may occur after mixing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

STORAGE:

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Powder may settle prior to opening. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
